description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. www.yyrgames.com - Play up to 4 continuously shuffling minigames at once, using the entire Xbox 360 Controller. Last as long as possible, attempt 30 increasingly-difficult Challenges, or try the full-featured Practice Mode. Great for parties!
